title: Make all Champions without Recall animations do their Taunt animation upon recalling
body: Until they add separate animations later

replies.body: At least do something with Gentleman Cho, it's ridiculous to have a legendary skin without so much as a recall animation.

Magnificent {{champion:4}}, Firefighter {{champion:18}}

Oooold Legendary skins are atrocious. Most of them don't even have new animations (Firefighter Trist at least got new *particle effects* with her VU)

Lord {{champion:82}} 


Such an awesome skin. But not worth the 975 RP.
Gatekeeper Galio doesn't have one either. I really feel like if I was playing a 975 skin as him, because his voiceover isn't even great compared to older legendary skins...
Riot simply refuses to lower the price of Gentleman Cho just because it's legendary, while at present it shows NOTHING of being worth legendary except for the silly voice. That's it.
Same with warring kingdoms {{champion:59}} that much for the skin and not even a recall animation it's just sad I mean lower the price already if no recall animation

i agree. with so many cool skins and animations in game now, a lack of recall animation just kinda dead catfish in a Koi pond. totally out of place.

Adding recall animations to champions like Ashe, Annie, Lulu, Singed, Maokai, Alistar, and the others who look modern but don't quite have all the bells and whistles probably wouldn't take too much effort on Riot's part. The model is already there, all they have to do is have the art team create the animations and let programming splice it into the already existing set of animations. It shouldn't be too difficult. They already prove that they can do such feats when they make skins that have custom recalls.
Sure. Although that might require actual work on riot's end.
Some of them might want to really take a breath while recalling you know?
You can already make your champ emote while recalling if you want. I would like everyone to have special recall animations, but to make it automatically be one you can already do seems unnecessary.
I think it'd be a good alternative and a neat temporary placeholder for champions that won't see VUs right away.
Except {{champion:111}} , he has to do his Joke

This would detract from sales of expensive skins.

So it won't happen.

Yeah, with all the other poor/lacking elements in actual gameplay, we should totally be focusing on cosmetics like Recall Animations. This post sums up the League Community and why free-to-play competitive games suffer in quality. It's just another watered-down game for children.
